content: this legal document outlines the division of ownership and assets among three individuals in a building located in camerano italy the building consists of three apartments and a garage bm is assigned the first apartment on the ground floor and the garage with a value of €112200 md is assigned the second apartment on the ground floor and the attic room on the second floor with a value of €180000 mg is assigned the third apartment on the first floor and the attic room on the second floor with a value of €78300 after the division bm is entitled to a balance of €100900 mg is entitled to a balance of €400 and md is responsible for the remaining balances the document also mentions the registration of the property and the issuance of a receipt for the settlement
